titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the additional 0.2 percent FUTA surtax.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E141)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/7/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 6.2% federal unemployment tax rate for calendar years 1988 through 2008 and apply the 6.0% rate.
